name: OpenTripPlanner
description: A multimodal router combining OSM and Public transport tables.

name: TapTap Map
description: See routes for TapTap's in Haiti as well as station information.

name: TransitMix
description: Tool for creating your own bus systems using OpenStreetMap data.

name: Glosm
description: OpenGL hardware-accelerated 3D renderer (both tile renderer and realtime first-person engine).

name: Appspot Transp. Map Comparison
description: Another transparent map comparison website.

name: TravelTime platform
description: Create isochrone shapes with an API or export to KML, get journey times from 1-100,000 points of interest in 1 request. Routing and geocoding also available.

name: Waymarked Trails
description: Worldwide maps for various outdoor activities. Shows  routes including the route symbols. With hillshading and relief.

name: CTGuides.com
description: Generates free custom self guided walking tours around London based upon choices such as length of tour and starting points. Uses OSM data for routing.

name: Keep Right
description: Displays mapping errors.

name: www.opensnowmap.org
description: Yet another ski map!.

name: NOVAM
description: Bus stop verification tool developed for the NaPTAN import in the UK.

name: XC Ski Trail Map
description: Shows cross-country ski runs around the world.

name: haihui
description: Collection of hiking maps, optimized for mobile use.

name: OpenRailwayMap
description: Detailed map of the railway network, based on OpenStreetMap. It considers all rail-mounted and automotive vehicles, e.g. railways, subways, trams und miniature railways.

name: OpenCycleMap
description: Slippy map with contours, hill colouring, cycle routes, bicycle parking and cafes that do fryups.

name: OMA
description: Description of hiking and cycling trails, various amenities near the trail. Listing of trails by regions. Listing of amenities and POI by regions.

name: OpenTopoMap
description: Mapas topográficos da Europa.

name: MAPS.ME
description: aplicativo móvel de mapas e navegação, que utiliza dados do OpenStreetMap

name: Geofabrik Map
description: Um Mapa Deslizante de tela cheia com várias visualizações de mapa.

name: Show Your Places
description: Galeria de imagens apresentadas em mapa.

name: Data Temperature
description: How 'hot' is a city dataset?.
documentation: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/SotM 2011 session: Insert Coin To Play

name: OSM Buildings
description: Digital city models from OSM and other open sources. Free 3D Viewer. Realtime data. Worldwide coverage.

name: Distance Calculator
description: Cria caminhos, mede comprimento e exporta para .GPX ou .KMZ.

name: Property search
description: Nestoria - Property search in Europe (UK, France, Italy, Germany, Spain), India, Brazil, Australia.

name: OpenStreetBrowser
description: Interactively browse not only the map but also the contained information.

name: Munzee
description: Scavenger hunt game where items (mostly QR codes) are found in the real world and captured using a smartphone. Mapnik and OpenCycleMap options.

name: CoMaps
description: Mapas offline rápidos, gratuitos, de código aberto e focados na privacidade, sem anúncios, desenvolvidos pela comunidade para a comunidade.

name: AddisMap
description: Adis Abeba (Etiópia) mapa da cidade com localizador de POI.

name: layers@osm-fr
description: Overlays showing streets with no name, no ref, no oneway; fixmes & notes text; administrative boundaries .

name: OSM-3D
description: Virtual Globe with SRTM terrain data and 3D buildings.

name: OpenPoiMap
description: Mostra diferentes tipos de POIs por escolha do usuário.

name: Agilogik GmbH
description: Servidor mundial de ladrilhos e serviços para uso comercial.

name: Osmose
description: Checks for issues.

name: uMap
description: Draw lines, markers, texts on OpenStreetMap base layers in a web map and share and collaborate with others.

name: Actuele spoorkaart Nederland
description: Realtime train position in Netherlands.

name: OSM3S PT diagrams
description: Public Transport Line Diagram.

name: Postcodes
description: Mostrando códigos de postagem do Reino Unido de diferentes projetos (veja Projetos Relacionados).

name: PNK map
description: Custom bicycle rendering for Prahou na kole (Prague on bike).

name: ÖPNVKarte
description: Map displaying routes of local public transportation (PSV) in Europe.

name: 123map Illustrator Export
description: Export map regions to Inkscape, Adobe Illustrator, Affinity Designer, CorelDraw.

name: Gesucht: Die grössten Ärgernisse im Stadtberner Verkehr
description: Project for reader involvement by BZ Berner Zeitung. The readers can add their points of traffic annoyance and other readers can comment/agree.

name: uNav
description: Map viewer and GPS navigator for Ubuntu Phone.

name: MapOSMatic
description: Export city maps as printer friendly PDF, SVG, ...

name: Apple Map Tiles
description: Switching between Apple map, to OpenStreetMaps and Google Maps.

name: Georeferencer
description: Allows to georeference JPG or TIFF picture on OSM map.

name: Old Maps Online
description: Collection of historic maps from all over the world. Allows to upload and geolocate additional old maps.

name: Editor usage stats
description: Statistics on which editor is used most.

name: OpenLinkMap
description: Slippy map showing additional information on the map.

name: Veganes Bern
description: Nice example of data/multimedia journalism. BZ report by journalist and visual designer about situation of vegetarian life in the city of Bern supported by SOSM's uMap tool.

name: MapBBCode
description: Import or draw paths and polygons and markers on a map, embed or share or export.

name: OSM Country Statistics
description: Details on user count, speed, node count.

name: FlightStats
description: Flight tracking service which uses OSM data as a part of their map data (attribution page).

name: fgmap
description: Real-time OSM map of flight position in FlightGear.

name: OpenFireMap
description: Worldwide map showing fire stations and hydrants on different backgrounds.

name: Raildar
description: Realtime train position in France (TGV, TER, Transilien, ...), Denmark, Finland, Ireland.

name: How did you contribute to OSM
description: Goes back in the user edits history and shows what are the first/last edits on OSM.

name: Wikipedia-World Layer
description: Shows categorized overlay of georeferenced Wikipedia articles.

name: Tracks Optimizer Online
description: Serviço na web de otimização de rastreamento GPX usando algoritmo Ramer–Douglas–Peucker.

name: Map of Belarus
description: Map of the Republic of Belarus.

name: ZonesWIFI
description: Worldwide Wifi Hotspots from OSM. Locate me button and Search panel let zoom-in to a zone and see the WIFI hotspots. Navigator refresh Button to request Wifi hotspots for a new zone.

name: Cartogiraffe
description: Mapa online, amigável à smartphones, com mapas padrão, transporte, ciclismo e caminhada.

name: MAPCAT
description: Custom-made, OSM-based worldwide map API for public websites, internal systems or mobile apps to let your location-based info come to life.

name: magOSM
description: OpenStreetMap daily up-to-date thematic data available as WMS/WFS service and for download as SHP, KML ...

name: Relation Analyzer
description: Analyze relations and find errors (optimized to find errors in the route relations).

name: Bärn isch eso - Die Stadttour mit der Burgergemeinde Bern
description: In sections as e.g. Hörbeiträge, Lieblingstouren or Praktisches use of OSM data and kind of OSM swiss style layer (download github).

name: QuiBitcoin
description: Enhanced map showing places in Italy where Bitcoin is accepted.

name: OsmAndMapCreator
description: OsmAnd data file parser and creator.

name: OpenTouchMap
description: Mapa deslizante capacidades gestuais básicas de iPhone, usando iol.js para smartphones.

name: streetdir
description: POI searching.

name: OSM ↔ Wikidata matcher
description: ferramenta livre de conexão entre o OpenStreetMap e o Wikidata

name: Freemap
description: Projeto para criar mapas livres e anotáveis do interior do Reino Unido. Os usuários podem sobrepor dados específicos do interior aos mapas. Mobile Java Client está evoluído (veja a página wiki).

name: Quadmap Compare
description: Compare 4 maps at the same time : OSM, Google Maps, Bing Maps, Yahoo Maps.

name: OsmHydrant
description: Easily add or modify fire water utilities like fire hydrants, suction points and water tanks even on your smartphone. Additionally coverage can be checked on the map.

name: Query-to-map
description: Online service for exporting POIs and lines as KML.

name: Freemap.sk
description: Mapa com toneladas de ferramentas, por exemplo medir distância e área, tela cheia, rotas a pé e de bicicleta, POIs, colinas, Mapas para baixar para diversos dispositivos, muitas possibilidades de exportação de mapas, roteamento e pesquisa, e assim vai. A maioria das ferramentas somente cobrem a região da Eslováquia, mais.

name: TopOSM
description: Mapas topográficos baseados em dados do OSM. (Atualmente) limitado aos Estados Unidos da América. Lars Ahlzen.

name: StreetComplete
description: Surveyor app for Android.

name: FLOSM
description: OSM with the Points of Interests of your choice, you can also download map as JPG or SVG.

name: overpass turbo
description: A web-based data filtering tool for OpenStreetMap.

name: Mapalizer
description:
Personalized location analyzer map tool for real estate websites.
Mapalizer adds a widget on your map to show adjustable semi-transparent score layer based on visitor's/client's preferences.

name: What Is Where
description: Powerful OSM based search engine. Supports multiple conditions and groups of conditions applied at the same time, saving/loading search projects, export results to CSV, etc.

name: MapRoulette
description: Para um mapa melhor, um bug de cada vez.

name: FreieTonne
description: Mapa Deslizante com Sobrecamada de POI representando Informação de Mapa Marítimo como Portos, Boias e outras marcações marítimas até mesmo para água branca. Navegação offline baseada em apache e ferramentas de mapeamento. Suporta marcações nos seus próprios mapas para Ozi, BitMap (iPhone), Seaclear...

name: Vending machines for cigarettes
description: Based on Leaflet map using an overlay showing the vending machines for cigarettes.

name: Wikipedia overlay
description: Zoomzoomzoom map highlighting map objects that contain external links, such as those tagged with Key:wikipedia or Key:url, flickr, dopplr, etc.

name: netzwolf.info OSM
description: Serviço de vários mapas.

name: OSM POI Export
description: Export POI from OSM into different formats (TomTom overlay (ov2), Garmin (csv), gpx, kml, OziExplorer (wpt)), GeoJSON. ATM restricted to BeNeLux region.

name: Open and Free Map
description: Worldwide overlay on mapnik showing public transport routes and stops available.

name: Toner by Stamen
description: Representação do mapa em branco e preto.

name: openstreetmap.cz
description: Czech OpenStreetMap with hiking trails overlay.

name: 4UMaps
description: Outdoor map with hillshading, elevation lines for hiking and biking. Download free offline maps.

name: OSMCha
description: software de validação do OpenStreetMap

name: OpenWhateverMap
description: A random patchwork map using different tile sources.

name: refs for U.S. interstates
description: Lists and finds the corresponding road segments and reference numbers for the American interstates.

name: LiveMapViewer
description: A java tool to see live changes based on Planet.osm diff.

name: Cartagen
description: Cartagen is an MIT Media lab project that renders OSM and other data in a HTML5 Canvas element dynamically on the client-side.

name: Pretty Maps
description: Very artistic map data representation.

name: Bike Citizens
description: Bike Citizens is a navigation app designed for and by cyclists, offers offline routing, predefined tours and various routing profiles.

name: OpenOrienteeringMap
description: Maps without names to improve your orienteering or play games. Only Map and the ability to print as PDF.

name: Merretekerjek
description: Feature rich bike route planner for Hungary and surrounding countries.

name: OpenStationMap
description: OpenStationMap is a project to map stations with routing, indoor, 3D and of course station specific features.

name: Openrouteservice
description: Route navigation based on osm data and TMC for car, bike and pedestrian.

name: Ride the City
description: Bicycle routing based on OSM data. Coverage: Selected big cities (currently 42) in U.S., Canada, Australia, France, Spain, few cities in other countries.

name: Open Brewpub Map
description: Lists all pubs where you can get homebrew beer (Hausbrauerei).

name: World Airport Codes
description: The place to find airport codes, abbreviations, runway lengths and other airport information.

name: Mittelsachsen Atlas
description: One of the first OSM maps by German officials presenting POIs of Landkreis Mittelsachsen.

name: QGIS
description: um aplicativo GIS multiplataforma livre.

name: Objetos históricos
description: Ver POI com referencias históricas num mapa OSM.

name: OSM with Streetview
description: Compare the coverage of UK between Ordnance Survey and OSM.

name: osm.santolibre.net
description: Worldwide overview of MTB routes, MTB routing, MTB route details with elevation profile and points of interest.

name: Geofabrik Map Compare
description: Two maps side by side. Several OpenStreetMap and Google maps are available.

name: OSMNames
description: Fulltext search based on OpenStreetMap database, ranking based on the popularity of related Wikipedia page.

name: Creating and downloading your individual multimedia map
description: Comfortable-to-use online service for creating maps with "needles" containing links to audio, photo, video. Example of a city-map.

name: NoName
description: Highlights roads with no name=* tag.

name: MapSwipe
description: Contribuição (indireta) supersimples para o HOT mapeamento humanitário, ajudando a encontrar objetos desejados em imagens.

name: Bounding Box Tool
description: Service for defining bounding box, which allows to download them in different formats.

name: Wikimedia Commons Overlay
description: Mostra camada de imagens georreferenciadas do Wikimedia Commons sobre uma renderização diferente do OSM.

name: Bigmap
description: Tool to create big maps.

name: OSM Contributors by Area
description: List of contributors who have participated in a given OSM area.

name: Geofabrik Tile coordinates map
description: Showing coordinate grid with Tile IDs.

name: Sächsische Postmeilensäulen
description: Karte mit Sächsische Postmeilensäulen und Poststraßen.

name: FacilMap
description: Renderizações diferentes do OSM, pesquisa e rotas arrastáveis, cria mapas personalizados com colaboração ao vivo onde arquivos de marcadores, linhas, rotas e GPX/KML/GeoJSON/OSM podem ser adicionados.

name: Leaflet Maps Marker - www.mapsmarker.com
description: Pin, organize and show your favorite places through OpenStreetMap, Google Maps, Google Earth (KML), Bing Maps, GeoJSON, GeoRSS or Augmented-Reality browsers.

name: Gmaps Pedometer
description: Um Mapa Deslizante que permite desenhar rotas e calcula a distância viajada e mostra bem as elevações.

name: BBBike
description: Routing focused on bikes (no. of traffic lights, height profile, lit, road surface, …).

name: EasyMap SlippyMap Generator
description: Create comfortably a SlippyMap based on OpenLayers and OSM-Tiles with  markers and different layers.

name: achavi
description: Augmented OSM Change Viewer: visualizes OpenStreetMap changes based on the Overpass API Augmented Delta (adiff) query. Supports continuous monitoring of an area of interest and visualizing single changesets (with some limitations).

name: Karte mit Stolpersteine-Layer
description: Showing {{wikipedia|en|Stolperstein}} on OSM map.

name: Naviki
description: Planning bicycle trips and routing and collecting GPS traces.

name: XAPI Viewer
description: Search and display any kind of tagged data.

name: Organic Maps
description: Mapas offline de todos os países, renderizador rápido, pesquisa offline.

name: Wanderpferde
description: Directory of accomodations for trail riders and horses in southern Germany. Also offers routing for horseback riding.

name: Mapzen Turn-by-Turn (Valhalla)
description: Worldwide routing by automobile, bus, foot, and bicycle.

name: CycleStreets
description: Bicycle routing and planning and photo map based on OpenStreetMap data and the OpenCycleMap for the British Isles. API available.

name: GraphHopper
description: Fast routing for bikes, pedestrians and cars with worldwide coverage. Based on Open Source routing engine GraphHopper.

name: Merkaartor
description: Good editor with styling.

name: European Navigable Waterways (map)
description: Map showing inland waterways (Europe).

name: F4 Map
description: WebGL technology, 3D buildings on a flat map, rotatable, shadows depending on time of day, visible rain depending on weather conditions.

name: Bexhill-OSM
description: Uma bifurcação desenvolvida do 'POIs on a Map' abaixo. Mostra POIs na área atual do mapa usando OverpassAPI, plota direções de caminhada, inverte pesquisas.

name: Old Oakland
description: Showing historical maps of Oakland on top of a own OSM map.

name: wiki
description: Monitoring the OSM edits in nearly realtime. Shows location and user name on a world map, not detailed.

name: HistOSM
description: Historic Information/Sites.

name: KeplerJs
description: The open source Geosocial platform. Documentation.

name: cast a map
description: Online service for generating (small) personal free-of-charge maps. Individual styles can be used against payment.

name: JOSM
description: Editor avançado do OpenStreetMap offline.

name: Treasure Maps
description: OSM map data visualized in "vintage style" to get a look like an old sketchy map, a treasure map or a pirate map.

name: MTB map Europe
description: Mountain bike map of Europe (recently extended from Czech Republic).

name: Map-Illustrators
description: OpenStreetMap available in Adobe Illustrator, PDF and EPS format. Editable vector map layers vector for print and online purposes.

name: KOMOOT Routing
description: calculate routes for mountain bikes, touring bikes and hiking taking your fitness level and elevation into account.

name: Information Freeway
description: Slippy map with tiles from Tiles@home, several sources, interface for rerender requests.

name: Field Papers
description: Wizard to print an map area for drawing on it to contribute to OSM.

name: Kurviger
description: Calculate curvy and fun routes for motorcyclists. Kurviger favours curves and slopes, while avoiding cities and highways. Generate loop trips with one click. Personalize the routing to your own riding style.

name: Osmocoder
description: Geocoder für D.

name: OpenTrailView
description: Geolocate photos of trails, paths, ... and stitch them together in a Google StreetView like way.

name: Hitchwiki Maps
description: Um Mapa-múndi para caroneiros, mostrando locais de carona com pontuação e descrição. Editável por qualquer um.

name: Carto
description: Visualização de dados online construido em stack de FLOSS, também fornece ladrilhos livres do OSM.

name: OpenSeaMap
description:
Carta náutica mostrando portos, marinas, faróis, marcos marítimos, etc.
Carta climática, previsão do tempo.

name: YoHours
description: Webpage for easy generation of opening hours (opening_hours=*).

name: Open Source Routing Machine (OSRM)
description:
A new fast routing service for car
covering the world.

name: 8-Bit Cities
description: Different major cities in 8-Bit console style graphic style.

name: live.osm.fr
description: Shows near live edits on both overview map (pin) and local map (bounding box), with stats, activity graph, and misc changeset info.

name: Taginfo
description: List and search for all tags.

name: WaterSupply.at
description: Map showing drinking waters sources. Apps for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone are also provided.

name: Verkehrszeichen Tool
description:
Wizard to get the right tags for traffic signs
look alternative JOSM-Plugin RoadSigns.

name: BRouter
description: BRouter: Let's get serious about bike routing. BRouter offers routing for trekking and cycling with predefined profiles and the ability to modify and upload custom profiles.

name: OSMbot for Telegram
description: O bot do OSM encontra qualquer localização no mundo da base de dados do OSM Nominatim.

name: Marble
description: programa gratuito para visualização de mapas geográficos

name: Watercolor by Stamen
description: Watercoloured repr{{gray cell|Unknown}}esentation of map.

name: Wheelmap
description: Wheelchair map that let user contribute to vote for Accessibility.

name: OpenAdvertMap
description: Interactive map showing advertisement data of OSM.

name: iD
description: editor visual capaz de editar mapas do OpenStreetMap

name: Bicycle tags map
description: Customizable view of cycling related tags.

name: CoinMap
description: Map showing places where Bitcoin is accepted.

name: AllRailMap
description: Simple and intuitive world railway map, improving upon the outstanding and sadly outdated Thorsten Büker's and Boris Chomenko's railway maps. Shows gauge, electrification status and voltage.

name: Baidu Maps
description: Saida do mapa mundi do OSM para a parte externa à China. Veja note de pé citando licença.

name: OpenLocalMap
description: A developed fork from 'POIs on a Map' below. Show POIs in the current area of the map using OverpassAPI, plot walking directions, address search, reverse lookups with easy customization.

name: Karte mit Grenzsteinen Sachsen-Preußen 1815
description: Historische Landesgrenze Königreich Sachsen Königreich Preußen 1815 (Wiener Kongress).

name: cycle.travel
description: Cycle route-planner with draggable routes and custom mapping for Western Europe and North America, run by Richard.

name: lombardo-geosystems.it
description: Mapas da Itália com pesquisa por vias urbanas e localizador de POI.

name: OSMapa
description: Estilo: OSMapa-Topo com trilhas de caminhada.

name: OpenLoveMap
description: Map showing some sex-related POIs.

name: OSM Inspector
description: Displays all kinds of possible dataset quality problems.

name: OSM Landuse
description: Landuse and landcover information.

name: OSM History Viewer
description: To see the difference last change on the tags and map.

name: Nominatim
description: Motor de busca OSM.

name: Nutiteq 3D SDK for Android
description: Android SDK supporting 3D buildings and 3D models on top of OSM flat map.

name: routing.osm.ch
description: Routing with Leaflet slippy map for pedestrians (two types), cyclists (two types) and cars in Switzerland only (based on OSRM).

name: Archäologie in OSM
description: Archäologie in Deutschland.

name: Sputnik
description: Site russo que fornece pesquisa por serviços estatais, POIs, roteamento a eles e pesquisa segura.

name: Vespucci
description: Editor Android para OpenStreetMap.

name: BuioMetria Partecipativa
description: Mostra a escuridão do céu medida com Sky Quality Meter.

name: BBBike Map Compare
description: Map Compare shows up to 170 different maps from OpenStreetMap, Google, Bing, Yahoo, Mapquest, Esri and others side by side. With the admin console you can configure your own local tile server and compare the map with others. Service by BBBike_@_World, software based on Geofabrik Map Compare.

name: Walking Papers
description: Wizard to print a map area for drawing on it to contribute to OSM. Currently unavailable (2015-10-14). See Field Papers.

name: WHODIDIT
description: OpenStreetMap Changeset Analyzer.

name: Karta GPS
description: Karta é um app de navegação livre combinando dados de mapa open-source com conteúdo relevante do Yelp e do Foursquare, como também informações não originadas por cooperação como dados de tráfego e câmeras de velocidade, sem necessitar conexão com a internet.

name: Isometric 3D map of Czech republic
description: Isometric 3D map of Czech republic (OpenKýblMap). A static Map renderer is at http://bitsteller.bplaced.net/osm/.
